sentence.Network_en: The grape phylloxera had disastrous effects on the French grape crop and wine industry.
sentence.Network_cn: 葡萄根瘤蚜对法国的葡萄生产和酿酒业带来了灾害性影响.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 根瘤蚜(Phylloxera)：可以杀死葡萄藤的植物虫害。在19世纪曾对法国的葡萄园具有摧毁性的打击；近来加州的葡萄园也深受其害。

auth_sentence.content: The Spaniards in Mexico actually grafted European vines on to native vine stocks, as a protection against phylloxera.
